content:
DeployManifest Class

Definition

Represents a ClickOnce deployment manifest.

In this Article

[System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisible(false)]
[System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRoot("DeployManifest")]
public sealed class DeployManifest : Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest
Inheritance
Object
Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest
DeployManifest

Constructors

DeployManifest()

Initializes a new instance of the DeployManifest class.

public DeployManifest ();

DeployManifest(String)

Initializes a new instance of DeployManifest.

public DeployManifest (string targetFrameworkMoniker);
targetFrameworkMoniker
String

A token that represents a version of the .NET Framework runtime.

Properties

CompatibleFrameworks

Gets the versions of the .NET Framework that an application can run on.

public Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.CompatibleFrameworkCollection CompatibleFrameworks { get; }
Value
CompatibleFrameworkCollection

A CompatibleFrameworkCollection class that represents the versions of the .NET Framework that an application can run on.

CreateDesktopShortcut

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to create a desktop shortcut.

public bool CreateDesktopShortcut { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

"true" or "false". A string that contains a value that indicates whether to create a desktop shortcut.

DeploymentUrl

Gets or sets the update location for the application.

public string DeploymentUrl { get; set; }
Value
String

A string that indicates the update location for the application.

Remarks

If this property is not specified, no update location will be defined for the application. However, if application updates are specified, the update location must be specified. The specified value should be a fully qualified URL or Universal Naming Convention (UNC) path.

DisallowUrlActivation

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the application should be blocked from being started by means of a URL.

public bool DisallowUrlActivation { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the application is blocked from being started by means of a URL otherwise, false.

Remarks

If this option is true, the application can only be started from the user's Start menu. The default is false. This option is ignored if Install is false.

EntryPoint

Gets or sets a deployment reference that is the entry point of the application.

public override Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyReference EntryPoint { get; set; }
Value
AssemblyReference

An AssemblyReference object that represents the entry point of the application.

ErrorReportUrl

Gets or sets the URL of the error report.

public string ErrorReportUrl { get; set; }
Value
String

A string that contains the URL of the error report.

Install

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the application is an installed application or an online-only application.

public bool Install { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the application is an installed application; otherwise, false.

Remarks

If this property is set to true, the application will be installed on the user's Start menu, and it can be removed by using Add or Remove Programs in Control Panel. The default is true. If this property is set to false, the application is intended for online use from a Web page and is available online only.

Note

For WPF Web Browser Applications, you must set the HostInBrowser property to true, and you must also set Install to false. If this condition is not met, you will receive MSBuild Error MSB3116.

MapFileExtensions

Gets or sets a value indicating whether .deploy file extension mapping is used.

public bool MapFileExtensions { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if .deploy file extension mapping is used; otherwise, false.

Remarks

If this property is set to true, every program file is published with a .deploy file extension. This setting is useful for Web server security to limit the number of file extensions that have to be unblocked to enable ClickOnce application deployment. The default is false.

MinimumRequiredVersion

Gets or sets the minimum required version number for an application.

public string MinimumRequiredVersion { get; set; }
Value
String

A string indicating the minimum required version number for an application.

Remarks

If the user's computer has a version of the application that is lower than the minimum required version specified by this property, the user will not have the option to skip the update. The default is to have no minimum required version. This input applies only when Install is set to true.

Product

Gets or sets the name of the application.

public string Product { get; set; }
Value
String

A string that indicates the name of the application.

Remarks

If no value is specified for this property, the name is inferred from the identity of the generated manifest. This name is used for the shortcut name on the Start menu and is part of the name that appears in Add or Remove Programs in Control Panel.

Publisher

Gets or sets the publisher of the application.

public string Publisher { get; set; }
Value
String

A string that indicates the publisher of the application.

Remarks

If no value is specified for this property, the name is inferred from the registered user or from the identity of the generated manifest. This name is used for the folder name on the Start menu and is part of the name that appears in Add or Remove Programs in Control Panel.

SuiteName

Gets or sets the suite name that is defined in the manifest.

public string SuiteName { get; set; }
Value
String

A string that contains the suite name.

SupportUrl

Gets or sets the link that appears in Add or Remove Programs in Control Panel for the application.

public string SupportUrl { get; set; }
Value
String

A string that indicates the support URL.

Remarks

The specified value should be a fully qualified URL or Universal Naming Convention (UNC) path.

TargetFrameworkMoniker

Gets or sets a token that represents a version of the .NET Framework runtime.

public string TargetFrameworkMoniker { get; set; }
Value
String

A String that represents a version of the .NET Framework runtime.

TrustUrlParameters

Gets or sets a value indicating whether URL query-string parameters are available to the application.

public bool TrustUrlParameters { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if URL query-string parameters are available to the application; otherwise, false.

Remarks

If this property is set to true, URL query-string parameters are available to the application. The default is false, specifying that parameters will not be available to the application.

UpdateEnabled

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the application is updatable.

public bool UpdateEnabled { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the application is updatable; otherwise, false.

Remarks

If this property is set to true, the application is updatable. The default is false. This input applies only when Install is set to true.

UpdateInterval

Gets or sets the update interval for the application.

public int UpdateInterval { get; set; }
Value
Int32

An integer that indicates the update interval for the application.

Remarks

The default is zero. This input only applies only when Install and UpdateEnabled are both set to true.

UpdateMode

Gets or sets an object indicating whether updates should be checked in the foreground before the application is started, or in the background while the application is running.

public Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.UpdateMode UpdateMode { get; set; }
Value
UpdateMode

An UpdateMode object that indicates whether updates should be checked before the application is started, or while the application is running.

Remarks

If this property is set to Foreground, updates are checked in the foreground. The default is Background. For more information, see UpdateMode.

This input only applies only when Install and UpdateEnabled are both set to true.

UpdateUnit

Gets or sets the units used for the crosoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.UpdateInterval* property.

public Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.UpdateUnit UpdateUnit { get; set; }
Value
UpdateUnit

An UpdateUnit object that indicates the units used for the crosoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.UpdateInterval* property.

Remarks

The following values are available for the units used for the update interval: Days, Hours, and Weeks. For more information, see UpdateUnit.

This input only applies only when Install and UpdateEnabled are both set to true.

XmlCompatibleFrameworks

Gets or sets the array of XML elements that represent the versions of the .NET Framework that an application can run on.

public Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.CompatibleFramework[] XmlCompatibleFrameworks { get; set; }
Value
CompatibleFramework[]

A CompatibleFramework class that represents the versions of the .NET Framework than an application can run on.

XmlCreateDesktopShortcut

Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the crosoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.CreateDesktopShortcut* property to an XML file.

public string XmlCreateDesktopShortcut { get; set; }
Value
String

The value of the crosoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.CreateDesktopShortcut* property.

XmlDeploymentUrl

Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the crosoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.DeploymentUrl* property to an XML file.

public string XmlDeploymentUrl { get; set; }
Value
String

The value of the crosoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.DeploymentUrl* property.

XmlDisallowUrlActivation

Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the crosoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.DisallowUrlActivation* property to an XML file.

public string XmlDisallowUrlActivation { get; set; }
Value
String

Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the crosoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.ErrorReportUrl* property to an XML file.

public string XmlErrorReportUrl { get; set; }
Value
String

Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the crosoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.Install* property to an XML file.

Value
String

Value

public string XmlMinimumRequiredVersion { get; set; }
Value
String

The value of the crosoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.MinimumRequiredVersion* property.

Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the crosoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.Product* property to an XML file.

public string XmlProduct { get; set; }
Value
String

The value of the crosoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.Product* property.

XmlPublisher

Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the crosoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.Publisher* property to an XML file.

public string XmlPublisher { get; set; }
Value
String

The value of the crosoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.Publisher* property.

XmlSuiteName

Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the crosoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.SuiteName* property to an XML file.

public string XmlSuiteName { get; set; }
Value
String

XmlSupportUrl

Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the crosoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.SupportUrl* property to an XML file.

Value
String

The value of the crosoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.SupportUrl* property.

Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the crosoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.TrustUrlParameters* property to an XML file.

public string XmlTrustUrlParameters { get; set; }
Value
String

Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the crosoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.UpdateEnabled* property to an XML file.

Value

Validate()

Performs various checks to verify the validity of the manifest. Any resulting errors or warnings are reported in the OutputMessageCollection object.

public override void Validate ();
